 Error and flow logging control.

Detailed Description

V.17 modem receive side descriptor. This defines the working state for a single instance of a V.17 modem receiver.

Member Data Documentation

float v17_rx_state_s::baud_phase

Baud phase for symbol sync.

DC filter for symbol sync.

Low band edge filter for symbol sync.
